title: Stream: Cloud Nothings – Attack On Memory
body:
**Cloud Nothing’s** new record **_Attack On Memory_** marks somewhat of a departure for the Ohio musician.

By enlisting the production talent of the world renowned Steve Albini, **Dylan Baldi** adopts a more aggressive, angst driven sound, ditching the twee, lo-fi elements that characterised his earlier work. Stream _**Attack On Memory**_ below, and expect a review over the coming days.

_**Attack On Memory**_ is released 24 January via [**Carpark Records**](http://www.carparkrecords.com/).

[Cloud Nothings – Attack On Memory](http://soundcloud.com/carparkrecords/sets/cloud-nothings-attack-on) by [Carpark Records](http://soundcloud.com/carparkrecords)  
Via [Complex](http://www.complex.com/music/2012/01/album-premiere-cloud-nothings-attack-on-memory).
